attributes.action: Let people make their own decisions to mix without covid restrictions
attributes.additional_details:
We as a nation are now fed up with the continued 'move on delay dates' to the plan set out. The vaccine has now inoculated mostly all of the at risk groups within the U.K that the virus was affecting. 
How are we ever learn to live with this virus if we keep having 'Last heave moments'? It just seem we will be still doing this for years to come.
attributes.background: To let the people decide whether to have their freedom back without covid restrictions in place if they choose from 21st June 2021

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584862
